definitions.definition: The portion of the head of a golf club to which the shaft of the club attaches.
definitions.example: Though largely ignored by players, hosel design is integral to the balance, feel and power of a club.

definitions.definition: (slang) A semester, in the context of a course of study which should be enjoyable as opposed to required work.
definitions.example: The new hosel will be using the format suggested by students.
